channel.title: Tyden 562/668 Personal Development Progress
channel.description:
[CENTER]This is my own personal development progress thread that I will be regularly posting to. I just decided to code this out of boredom so this means that I might not host this but I may release this into the download section.
[CODE]Features All features of titanPk's source + Update progress + extra small fixes
Update progress: A lot more have been completed before April 4th. I forgot most of them though.
[COLOR="lime"]May 16, 2012[/COLOR] Added ice prison attack for nex, finishing castlewars still.
[COLOR="lime"]May 12, 2012[/COLOR] Started a castlewars base.
[COLOR="lime"]May 11, 2012[/COLOR] 100% working music!!!! Nearly all regions works :D Fixed multi combat zones for players.
[COLOR="lime"]May 9, 2012[/COLOR] 100% music unlocking system! Music by region is only 20% done. I need to get region ids.
[COLOR="lime"]May 6, 2012[/COLOR] GrandExchange now 90% works. Just need to fix prices.
[COLOR="lime"]May 2, 2012[/COLOR] Npc vs npc system done. All bugs fixed. Added Ice prison for nex.
[COLOR="Lime"]May 1, 2012[/COLOR] NVN system has been improved A LOT! 85% complete. Npc walking bug is being fixed.
[COLOR="lime"]April 29, 2012[/COLOR] Adding NPC VS NPC system about 30% done. Still lots of bugs.
[COLOR="lime"]April 15, 2012[/COLOR] Finished working on 75% Nex with working phases and attacks Using 668 now.
[COLOR="Lime"]April 4, 2012[/COLOR] Rewrote magic, its now much more customisable with correct proj.
[/CODE] [u][b]NEX[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i2.lulzimg.com/4fcd6bbfc7.png[/img]

[QUOTE][B]Current Planned Updates:[/B]
- Castle wars.
Castle wars progress: Things done are in green, things partially done are in blue. [COLOR="Green"]• Joining • Waiting room • Fully working teams • Flag taking • Scoring • HintIcon when taking flag[/COLOR] • [COLOR="Green"]Flag dropping[/COLOR] • [COLOR="Blue"]PVP SYSTEM[/COLOR] // Half-assed this l0l will fix later when i finish objects
[IMG]http://i2.lulzimg.com/004db6e412.png[/img]
Below is ether not finished or started. Some have been updated now.
• [COLOR="Blue"]Barricades[/COLOR] • [COLOR="Blue"]Catapult[/COLOR] • [COLOR="Blue"]underground[/COLOR] • [COLOR="Blue"]All objects[/COLOR] = 2 more objects left. •[COLOR="Blue"] Rewards[/COLOR] [/QUOTE]
More updates to come. May release. Recent updates are now at the end of the thread Credits Titanpk/Titandino - TitanPk source[/CENTER]

item.title: Tyden 562/668 Personal Development Progress
item.dc:creator: @darkside1222 darkside1222
item.description:
@darkside1222 wrote:

Thanks ruby!
[CENTER]Recent Updates:

Infection

  • The game no longer ends if your team has 0 players

  • If you are the last one standing on your team, you get special abilities to help you get another person infected/uninfected.
    If you die, you won’t go on the other person’s team that killed you because you are the last 1 standing. You will become a SURPREME ZOMBIE/HUMAN

  • Game ends in about 5-10 minutes handled by TimerTask instead of processes

  • Rewards will be very valuable for the team that wins

[B]- SURPREME Abilities include…
= Recoil that deflects 40-60% of the attacker’s damage

= RANDOM Dharok’s effect. If your hp is low, it allows you to make a simple weapon like a dragon dagger to hit above 40s+ without special

= RANDOM healing effects, faster attacking, draining other’s attack stat and adds 60% of the players strength level to your boosts

= Death abilities.
= Other abilities are planned but these ones are the default ones.

[SIZE=4]Fixes and patches[/SIZE]

  • Nex no longer hits players outside of her area. Added cap damage of 500.
  • Hati Wolf has been buffed
  • Re-added lucien and added cap damage
  • Deflect Nex will deflect 100% of the damage and is no longer bugged
  • Fixed a few healing methods.
  • Castle wars is now being worked on abysspartyy
  • You can no longer spawn items that are lendable
  • Player.java was cleaned
  • Re-used Titan’s magic system

[/B]
[/CENTER]

[center]I have been thinking of hosting this server by the middle of july. I’m starting to prepare the server for hosting anyways

The plans for the beta version is:

  • Spawn version. Don’t worry, Tyden will become a eco server once beta ends
  • Reasons why it’s spawn is because I want people to test combat and certain skills for bugs etc.
  • Infection is the only minigame that is currently working and is avalible for testing
  • Castle wars & duel arena will be left out for now but I will eventually add them during hosting
  • Woodcutting and mining are the 2 skills that work properly

Not much updates for now because i’m also working on a F2P 317 server as well!
I will be making a project thread later on
[/CENTER]

Read full topic

item.title: Tyden 562/668 Personal Development Progress
item.dc:creator: @darkside1222 darkside1222
item.description:
@darkside1222 wrote:

[CENTER]
Infection - custom minigame

New custom minigame that is almost finished!
This is my 3rd minigame that I have made from scratch 80% Finished.
I need to add clipping support and fix up on some zombie side stuff.

Main Lobby
[/SPOILER]

Waiting Area
You wait for 2 mins. There has to be more than 2 players inorder for it to start

InGame Start
[/SPOILER]

Ingame combat
You cannot attack your own team-mates.
[/SPOILER]

Ingame rules

Rewards

[CODE]/The MiniGame********************************

  • Teams will be divided equally. 22 players, it will be 11-11
  • Game Timer is 5 mins MINIMUM
  • Maximum of 50 players in one game
  • Current rewards are random pvp loots. Will change later.
  • Killing a human/zombie will give you pk points
  • If your a human and you kill a zombie, zombie will become a human
  • if your a zombie and you kill a human, human will become zombie
  • In the end, the team with the most players wins!
    /The MiniGame*****************************/[/CODE]

The pictures that I have posted only shows about 60% of the things done. Everything is almost finished except for some things such as handling how the zombies team wins.

Other updates:

  • Hati wolf is now 60% completed. Melee has been added and magic has
    been added. I still need the gfx
  • Planning to rewrite castlewars. It’s a shitty messy code lol.

MINI updates:

Fixed a few spec weapons for Player vs npc
I decided not to release this for reasons.
Infection is now 95% complete. I have changed the game mechanics and rules.
Pest control base has been started
Castle wars has been completely rewritten. Better conventions etc. It’s not as messy anymore.

[/CENTER]

Read full topic

item.title: Tyden 562/668 Personal Development Progress
item.dc:creator: @darkside1222 darkside1222
item.description:
@darkside1222 wrote:

No I haven’t made a website yet

[CENTER] Small updates and fixes

Castle Wars
-Can no longer get flag when you are weilding something.
-Hint icons are still fucked up but they are tweaked just a bit
-Fixed death events when you die in Castle Wars
-Familiars now function properly.
-No-clipping when you attack is partially fixed.
-Large door has been added.
-Barricade is under development.

Other updates and fixes
-Familiars now attack other npcs when you are under attack.
-Nex’s hp has been decreased from 300k to 30k hitpoints. Her minions’s hp are tweaked to 6k instead of 10k. Nex’s defence has been fixed and she can now drain your stats
-Added Lucien as a fun boss
-Npc now drops normal bones instead of big bones by default
-Retribution only works for pvp
-Corp has been moved to it’s original place
-Added a training area.
-Dynamic regions
-A new quest will be coming soon, it will preview the Npc Vs Npc system and familiar system
-Server will be hosted soon. No estimate date

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
